name: Avtron Technologies
tag_list: cctv, cctv-camera, security-camera, dvr, surveillance-camera, cctv-dvr
overview:
Avtron Technology is ISO 9000:2001 certified company and maximum products are also conform to UL/CE/FCC along with Restriction of hazardous substances Compliance. Our company has whole sale and broad manufacturing in CCTV Camera, Dome camera, IR camera, Security camera and more products that conformed by UL/CE/FCC along with Restriction of hazardous substances compliance.

Our Company manufacturing two types of products like First one is Monarch series for ultra high resolution requirement and second one is atom series for high resolution requirements. Different products of CCTV surveillance like dome camera, IR camera, box camera, pin camera, bullet camera and also there are lots of variety depends on your requirements.
